item.title: Ganga Forging Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure
item.description: Shares of Ganga Forging Ltd surged to hit the upper circuit limit on 17 Dec 2025, reflecting intense buying interest and a maximum daily gain of 17.88%. The micro-cap stock, operating in the Castings & Forgings sector, witnessed a significant spike in price and trading volume, prompting a regulatory freeze on further transactions for the day. Time: 53 minutes ago

item.title: JITF Infra Logistics Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure

item.title: Flexituff Ventures International Hits Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure

item.title: Gretex Industries Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of Gretex Industries Ltd plunged to their lower circuit limit on 17 Dec 2025, reflecting intense selling pressure and a sharp decline in investor confidence.
